paper.title: From abstract model to efficient compilation of patterns
paper.venue: Proceedings of the 5th Colloquium on International Symposium on Programming
paper.abstract: Pattern matching is a technique which is used in many application areas such as text manipulation in editors, manipulation of arithmetic formulas in computer algebra systems and in artificial intelligence applications. In programming systems it can be a built-in language facility as string matching in SNOBOL4 or a language extension for matching of list structures as in INTERLISP.
